about_the_game:
Introducing the Yooka-Laylee costume pack! 

The power of friendship and a love of collectables come together in the form of this FREE DLC pack containing a tribute to a modern icon of 3D platformers! 

Legends speak of a powerful duo who once collected every single item, even as far as the eye could see. Secrets revealed, coins collected, challenges overcome. They say to reflect your heroes, you must reflect their ways…
detailed_description:
Introducing the Yooka-Laylee costume pack! 

The power of friendship and a love of collectables come together in the form of this FREE DLC pack containing a tribute to a modern icon of 3D platformers! 

Legends speak of a powerful duo who once collected every single item, even as far as the eye could see. Secrets revealed, coins collected, challenges overcome. They say to reflect your heroes, you must reflect their ways…

name: Kao the Kangaroo - Yooka Laylee X Kao the Kangaroo DLC

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win 10 or newer
  • Processor: i5 3300 3,20 GHz 4 cores/4 threads
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 760 2 gb
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: The power of friendship and a love of collectables come together in the form of this FREE DLC pack containing a tribute to a modern icon of 3D platformers!
supported_languages:
English*, Polish*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Czech, Hungarian, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Portugal, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support
